entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Reflecting to find nullability of a generic return type is unreasonably complicated #110971
  • [API Proposal]: Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.PhysicalFilesWatcher should expose modified files (Alternative where standalone FilesystemWatcher won't work) #110969
  • [JIT] Codegen issue for `InlineArray` in `record` #110968
    Future
  • InlineArray reports wrong size when struct size is specified #110962
  • Remove redundant partial modifier #110961

Closed

  • Suspiscous comment about constrained calls in `MemoryExtensions.cs`, `StringBuilder.cs`, and `DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler.cs` #110594
  • [mono] Linux arm64 AOT build failing on perf jobs #110963
  • [mono] AOT-llvm arm64 Performance runs crashing since 2024/09/30 #109220
  • [mono] [android] System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.IPGlobalPropertiesTest.IPGlobalProperties_DomainName_ReturnsEmptyStringWhenNotSet fails #109280
    10.0.0
  • [mono] MiniJIT System.Formats.Nrbf.Tests getting killed #108515
    Future
  • [apple][TvOS] Timeout when building aot-instances.dll for System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests #103692
    10.0.0
  • [Apple] TvOS-arm64 failures on Serialization ExporterTypesTests #104162
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix `ConvertTypeCheckPatternToNullCheck` #110973
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Experimental branch to check asmdiff #110972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Apple mobile] Enable trimming on build machines to match ILLink features #110966
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0

Merged

  • [Safe code] Clean up Guid.TryFormatX #110923
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix some paramrefs #110956
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [mono][arm64] Remove MonoAOT aarch64 linux-gnu-5 build conditions and use the gnu-7 by default #110965
    arch-arm64, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Delete unnecessary #pragma warning disable #110948
    area-System.Linq

Updated

  • JIT: Optimize struct parameter register accesses in the backend #110819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Unify Swift parameter register homing with normal homing #110859
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Code modernization in System.Linq #110910
    area-System.Linq
  • [draft] Improve startup and warmup performance for invoke by reducing emit usage #109901
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • Exit the lock before we call into user code and handle losing the race for the RCW table #110828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Clean up in Number.Formatting.cs #110955
    area-System.Numerics
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • Add lock in ValidateName #110780
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException thrown on a retrieval of derived attribute with overridden property getter #110945
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Support generic fields in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #110839
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 9.0.x
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use -pack switch instead of -allconfigurations to create packages #110778
    needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0] fix browser-wasm debug build #110943
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 9.0.x
  • Fix GetModuleFileName in GetProcessPath #110888
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
